main_text_p: Fast, reliable, and sustainable rides at your fingertips
about_title: Empowering Your Travel Experience with eTaxi
about_desc: Empowering your travel experience with fast, reliable, and eco-friendly rides.
feature_drivers_desc: Our drivers are experienced and well-trained to ensure your safety and comfort.
services_title: Elevate Your Experience with Our Services
services_transfer_desc: Whether you need an airport transfer or a ride to a special event, our transfer services are reliable and convenient.
services_taxi_desc: Our taxi services offer a comfortable and efficient way to get around the city.
services_bottom_desc: Our services are designed to meet all your transportation needs. Whether you need a quick ride across town, a reliable airport transfer, or a comfortable taxi for a special event, we've got you covered. Our professional drivers ensure your safety and comfort throughout the journey.
section_title: Choose the Perfect Tariff for Every Journey
tariff_i_desc: The rate per kilometer applied on weekdays within the administrative boundaries of the city.
tariff_ii_desc: Applied during nighttime hours from 10:00 PM to 6:00 AM and on Sundays and public holidays.
tariff_iii_desc: Rate per kilometer applied on weekdays between 6:00 AM and 10:00 PM outside the city limits.
tariff_iv_desc: Applied during nighttime hours from 10:00 PM to 6:00 AM and on Sundays and public holidays outside the city limits.
feature_flexible_desc: Our flexible scheduling allows you to book rides at your convenience.
feature_customer_desc: We prioritize our customers' needs and satisfaction above all else.
why_choose_us_desc: Our service stands out for its high reliability and safety, ensuring comfort and convenience for every customer. We strive to make your journey as pleasant and hassle-free as possible, no matter where you're headed. Our team is always focused on achieving the best results and meeting our clients' needs.
feature_reliable_service_desc: Our company guarantees reliability and stability in every aspect of our service. You can be sure that you'll receive the best service every time.
feature_safety_first_desc: We prioritize safety above all else. Our drivers are highly trained and adhere to all safety standards to ensure your peace of mind.
feature_user_friendly_desc: Our interface and service are designed for user convenience. Simple and intuitive features allow you to quickly and easily make a reservation.
feature_professional_drivers_desc: Our drivers are professionals with years of experience. They are always ready to provide you with a comfortable and safe ride.
footer_about_text: eTaxi — your reliable partner for eco-friendly and convenient rides. We offer fast, reliable, and sustainable taxi services to ensure you always reach your destination on time and stress-free.
footer_support: Our Support and Sales team is available 24/7 to answer your queries
footer_copyright: Copyright © 2025 eTaxi | Design by RichYou Agency
select_map_points: Please select points on the map.
select_pickup_point: Click on the map to select the pickup point.
select_dropoff_point: Click on the map to select the dropoff point.
